segments.text: You ’ re not going to believe what happened today . You ’ Ve got to promise to keep it to yourself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Today Mr . Leo threw Sally out of class !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ ll say . I knew Sally would finally show her true colors . When she got her final test results back from Mr . Leo , she started yelling at him . You should have heard her . I ’ Ve never seen anyone get so upset before . To make a long story short , it seems that Mr . Leo failed her because he caught her cheating .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s no laughing matter . That means she ’ ll have to take the whole course again . I can ’ t believe she ’ s going to have to start from the beginning .
segments.speaker: S2
